Extension for fetching videos from vimeo.com and vidtags.com by injecting download buttons directly into the Vimeo or VidTags player.

VidPowr app for Vimeo and VidTags extension which allows injecting download buttons directly into these players and thereafter allows you to fetch videos from these 2 platforms to VidPowr.com

The main concepts of VidPowr for Vimeo and VidTags extension are:
- provide injection only on user demand
- minimal resource consumption
- minimal permissions request

 
NOTE: 
â€’ This extension is not affiliated with Vimeo or VidTags.
